licence_overview:
To keep or use radioactive material at premises you need a certificate of registration from the [Scottish Environment Protection Agency (SEPA).](http://www.sepa.org.uk/ "Scottish Environment Protection Agency (SEPA)"){:rel="external"}

Application forms can be accessed via the SEPA website.
